publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2958.1 Mrs Nanette Milne: Sexual Health—As an amendment to motion (S2M-2958) in the name of Mr Andy Kerr, leave out from “and welcomes” to end and insert “believes, however, that centrally directed sexual health strategies, such as the Executive’s sexual health and relationships strategy, will have a limited reach, and considers that the Executive should publicly affirm the primary responsibility of parents in ensuring that their children are brought up with respect for themselves and others.”
